## Installation

```shell
pip install -U stac-model
```

or install with uv:

```shell
uv add stac-model
```
Then you can run

```shell
stac-model --help
```

## Creating example metadata JSON for a STAC Item

```shell
stac-model
```

This will make [this example item](./examples/item_basic.json) for an example model.
